Header: The cabinet approves the proposal to provide laptops for 665 schools
Content: The cabinet has approved the proposal to provide laptops for 665 schools with the aim of empowering school children with information technology. According to the proposal submitted by Minister of Education Akila Viraj Kariyawasam 15,445 laptops will be provided to those schools. The programme will be implemented covering all provinces of the country. 200 million rupees has been allocated for the programme. Steps will be taken to provide electricity for the schools who lack such facilities to use the computers.
